summary.span: 保留构成 内容的项的列表。

span.span: Holds the list of items that constitute the content of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 维护一系列项，如字符串、 对象、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]节点、 元素和其他集合。 maintains a collection of items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, and other collections. 使用中的数据来生成其内容。An uses the data in the to generate its content. 如果你想要聚合多个集合，将分配到属性在。If you want to aggregate more than one collection, assign a to the property of your . 可以使用两种属性或属性来指定应该用于生成的内容的集合在。Use either the property or the property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your . 当属性设置，只读的且具有固定大小，将进行收集。When the property is set, the collection will be made read-only and fixed-size. 这意味着，如果您使用属性，您不能添加、 删除或更改中的项直接。This means that if you are using the property, you cannot add, delete, or change items in the directly. 是，因此提供了集合视图功能，例如排序、 分组和筛选。 is a and therefore provides collection view functionalities, such as sorting, grouping, and filtering. 有关详细信息，请参阅、和。For more information, see , , and . 有关集合视图的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 如果有，如具有内容，则可以使用属性来访问，它是一个视图。If you have an , such as a that has content, you can use the property to access the , which is a view. 因为它是一个视图，然后可以使用如排序、 筛选和分组视图相关的功能。Because it is a view, you can then use the view-related functionalities such as sorting, filtering, and grouping. 请注意，当 ItemsSource 设置时，查看操作委托给视图的 ItemsSource 集合。Note that when ItemsSource is set, the view operations delegate to the view over the ItemsSource collection. 因此，仅支持排序、 筛选和分组才委托的视图。Therefore, the ItemCollection supports sorting, filtering, and grouping only if the delegated view supported them. 下面的示例演示如何进行排序的内容名为`myListBox`。The following example shows how to sort the content of a named `myListBox`. 在此示例中，`Content`是要作为排序依据的属性的名称。In this example, `Content` is the name of the property to sort by. [!code-csharp[ListBoxSort_snip#Sort](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxSort_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#sort)] [!code-vb[ListBoxSort_snip#Sort](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxSort_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#sort)] 该视图时执行此操作时，可能会或可能不是默认视图，具体取决于如何设置数据上你。When you do this, the view might or might not be the default view, depending on how the data is set up on your . 例如，当属性绑定到，获取使用该视图属性不是默认视图。For example, when the property is bound to a , the view that you obtain using the property is not the default view. 如果你绑定 (使用属性)，则可以执行以下操作以获取默认视图：If your is bound (you are using the property), then you can do the following to get the default view: [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#MyView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#myview)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#MyView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#myview)] [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#GetView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#getview)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#GetView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#getview)] 或者，可以指定筛选、 排序和分组中的条件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用。Alternately, you can specify filtering, sorting, and grouping criteria in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] using .

summary.span: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于将更改合并到视图并延迟自动刷新。

returns.span: 一个可用于释放调用对象的 对象。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常用于创建`using`作用域，然后将多个视图更改调用放在范围内。This method is typically used to create a `using` scope and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope. 这会延迟自动刷新，直到退出延迟循环。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

span.span: Removes the specified item reference from the collection or view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集合删除项后，任何剩余项的较高索引值递减其索引由一个集合的大小会折叠。When an item is removed from the collection, any remaining items with higher index values decrement their index by one as the size of the collection collapses.

exception.span: 为只读，因为它处于 模式或 DeferRefresh 正在起作用。

span.span: The is read-only because it is in mode or if DeferRefresh is in effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来测试是否当前实现支持之前添加排序对象添加到。Use the property to test whether the current implementation supports sorting before adding objects to the . > [!NOTE] > 此属性可以设置只能通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。This property can be set only by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 要访问的集合对象的属性是只读的而集合本身是可读写。The property to access the collection object is read-only, while the collection itself is read-write.
